CODE             	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
0            	UNKNOWN                          	UNK                        
1            	VISUAL FLIGHT RULES              	VFR                        
2            	VISUAL-FLIGHT FOLLOWING          	VFF                       
3            	INSTRUMENT FLIGHT RULES          	IFR                        
4            	DEFENSE VISUAL FLIGHT RULES      	DFR                       
5            	MILITARY CONTROL                 	GCI                       
6            	VFR ON TOP                       	VTP                        
7            	SPECIAL VFR                      	CVF                        
8            	NONE                             	NON                        
9            	AIR TAXI FLIGHT FOLLOWING        	CFP                        
99999        	FLIGHT PLAN INVALID              	ERROR MESSAGE
